card.name: All Is Dust
card.property: Each player sacrifices all colored permanents they control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The emergence of the Eldrazi isn't necessarily a bad thing, as long as you've already lived a fulfilling and complete life without regrets." —Javad Nasrin, Ondu relic hunter

card.name: Artisan of Kozilek
card.property: When you cast this spell, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Annihilator 2 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices two permanents.)

card.name: Emrakul, the Aeons Torn
card.property: This spell can't be countered. When you cast this spell, take an extra turn after this one. Flying, protection from colored spells, annihilator 6 When Emrakul, the Aeons Torn is put into a graveyard from anywhere, its owner shuffles their graveyard into their library.

card.name: Karn Liberated
card.property: +4: Target player exiles a card from their hand. −3: Exile target permanent. −14: Restart the game, leaving in exile all non-Aura permanent cards exiled with Karn Liberated. Then put those cards onto the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Kozilek, Butcher of Truth
card.property: When you cast this spell, draw four cards. Annihilator 4 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices four permanents.) When Kozilek, Butcher of Truth is put into a graveyard from anywhere, its owner shuffles their graveyard into their library.

card.name: Ulamog, the Infinite Gyre
card.property: When you cast this spell, destroy target permanent. Indestructible Annihilator 4 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices four permanents.) When Ulamog, the Infinite Gyre is put into a graveyard from anywhere, its owner shuffles their graveyard into their library.

card.name: Ulamog's Crusher
card.property: Annihilator 2 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices two permanents.) Ulamog's Crusher attacks each combat if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Whatever the Eldrazi's purpose is, it has nothing to do with something so insignificant as us." —Nirthu, lone missionary

card.name: Apostle's Blessing
card.property: ({W/P} can be paid with either {W} or 2 life.) Target artifact or creature you control gains protection from artifacts or from the color of your choice until end of turn.

card.name: Arrest
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bladehold houses a rogues' gallery filled with the living "statues" of the worst enemies of the Auriok.

card.name: Battlegrace Angel
card.property: Flying Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, it gains lifelink until end of turn.

card.name: Celestial Purge
card.property: Exile target black or red permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They say only the good die young. Obviously, you are one of the exceptions." —Delrobah, cleric of Ivora Gate

card.name: Conclave Phalanx
card.property: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) When Conclave Phalanx enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life for each creature you control.

card.name: Court Homunculus
card.property: Court Homunculus gets +1/+1 as long as you control another artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mages of Esper measure their wealth and status by the number of servants in their retinues.

card.name: Daybreak Coronet
card.property: Enchant creature with another Aura attached to it Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has first strike, vigilance, and lifelink. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let the deception of the gods yield to the pure light of day." —Brimaz, king of Oreskos

card.name: Dispatch
card.property: Tap target creature. Metalcraft — If you control three or more artifacts, exile that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Venser wondered if it could still be called a teleportation spell if the destination is oblivion.

card.name: Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite
card.property: Vigilance Other creatures you control get +2/+2. Creatures your opponents control get -2/-2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Gitaxians whisper among themselves of other worlds. If they exist, we must bring Phyrexia's magnificence to them."

card.name: Fortify
card.property: Choose one — • Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn. • Creatures you control get +0/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Where metal is tainted and wood is scarce, we are best armed by faith." —Tavalus, acolyte of Korlis

card.name: Hikari, Twilight Guardian
card.property: Flying Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may exile Hikari, Twilight Guardian. If you do, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Indomitable Archangel
card.property: Flying Metalcraft — Artifacts you control have shroud as long as you control three or more artifacts. (An artifact with shroud can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Every sword drawn to defend is an angelic blade, guided to justice by an angelic hand." —Auriok proverb

card.name: Iona, Shield of Emeria
card.property: Flying As Iona, Shield of Emeria enters the battlefield, choose a color. Your opponents can't cast spells of the chosen color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No more shall the righteous cower before evil.

card.name: Kami of Ancient Law
card.property: Sacrifice Kami of Ancient Law: Destroy target enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Duty and law are the foundation on which civilization stands. They must not fall, for when they do, they take everything with them." —Lord Konda

card.name: Kor Duelist
card.property: As long as Kor Duelist is equipped, it has double strike. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Swords cannot reach far enough. Chains cannot strike hard enough. An eternal dilemma, but a simple one."

card.name: Leyline of Sanctity
card.property: If Leyline of Sanctity is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield. You have hexproof. (You can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

card.name: Mighty Leap
card.property: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The southern fortress taken by invaders? Heh, sure . . . when elephants fly." —Brezard Skeinbow, captain of the guard

card.name: Mirran Crusader
card.property: Double strike, protection from black and from green

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A symbol of what Mirrodin once was and hope for what it will be again.

card.name: Mirror Entity
card.property: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) {X}: Until end of turn, creatures you control have base power and toughness X/X and gain all creature types.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Unaware of Lorwyn's diversity, it sees only itself, reflected a thousand times over.

card.name: Moonlit Strider
card.property: Sacrifice Moonlit Strider: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. Soulshift 3 (When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

card.name: Myrsmith
card.property: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, create a 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Auriok see the artificer as a conduit, beckoning new creations into the world.

card.name: Oblivion Ring
card.property: When Oblivion Ring enters the battlefield, exile another target nonland permanent. When Oblivion Ring leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Otherworldly Journey
card.property: Exile target creature. At the beginning of the next end step, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The landscape shimmered and I felt a chill breeze. When my vision cleared, I found myself alone among the corpses of my fallen friends." —Journal found in Numai

card.name: Raise the Alarm
card.property: Create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like blinking or breathing, responding to an alarm is an involuntary reflex.

card.name: Skyhunter Skirmisher
card.property: Flying, double strike

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Like dawn's first light, blind the unprepared and banish the shadows." —Skyhunter creed

card.name: Spectral Procession
card.property: Create three 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I need never remember my past associates, my victims, my mistakes. Innistrad preserves them all for me." —Sorin Markov

card.name: Sunlance
card.property: Sunlance deals 3 damage to target nonwhite creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's easy for the innocent to speak of justice. They seldom feel its terrible power." —Orim, Samite inquisitor

card.name: Sunspear Shikari
card.property: As long as Sunspear Shikari is equipped, it has first strike and lifelink.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Left without their leader Raksha, the leonin split into two prides: one side supported the regent kha, while the other rebelled in fury.

card.name: Taj-Nar Swordsmith
card.property: When Taj-Nar Swordsmith enters the battlefield, you may pay {X}. If you do, search your library for an Equipment card with converted mana cost X or less and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Terashi's Grasp
card.property: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. You gain life equal to its converted mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The jeweler, the potter, the smith . . . They all imbue a bit of their souls into their creations. The kami destroy that crafted mortal shell and absorb the soul within." —Noboru, master kitemaker

card.name: Waxmane Baku
card.property: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may put a ki counter on Waxmane Baku. {1}, Remove X ki counters from Waxmane Baku: Tap X target creatures.

card.name: Aethersnipe
card.property: When Aethersnipe enters the battlefield, return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. Evoke {1}{U}{U} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

card.name: Air Servant
card.property: Flying {2}{U}: Tap target creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Wind is forceful, yet ephemeral. It can knock a dragon out of the sky, yet pass through the smallest crack unhindered." —Jestus Dreya, Of Elements and Eternity

card.name: Argent Sphinx
card.property: Flying Metalcraft — {U}: Exile Argent Sphinx. Return it to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step. Activate this ability only if you control three or more artifacts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A great mirage, a dream of wings and silver.

card.name: Cloud Elemental
card.property: Flying Cloud Elemental can block only creatures with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The sky teems with just as much life as the forest or the deep seas." —Hadi Kasten, Calla Dale naturalist

card.name: Cryptic Command
card.property: Choose two — • Counter target spell. • Return target permanent to its owner's hand. • Tap all creatures your opponents control. • Draw a card.

card.name: Faerie Mechanist
card.property: Flying When Faerie Mechanist enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal an artifact card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Flashfreeze
card.property: Counter target red or green spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your downfall was not your ignorance, your weakness, or your hubris, but your warm blood." —Heidar, Rimewind master

card.name: Guile
card.property: Guile can't be blocked except by three or more creatures. If a spell or ability you control would counter a spell, instead exile that spell and you may play that card without paying its mana cost. When Guile is put into a graveyard from anywhere, shuffle it into its owner's library.

card.name: Helium Squirter
card.property: Graft 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this creature onto it.) {1}: Target creature with a +1/+1 counter on it gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Hurkyl's Recall
card.property: Return all artifacts target player owns to their hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hurkyl's research at the College of Lat-Nam wasn't enough to stop the two brothers, but for centuries thereafter her spellcraft taught artificers restraint.

card.name: Inexorable Tide
card.property: Whenever you cast a spell, proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "See how gratefully this world accepts our blessings." —Jin-Gitaxias, Core Augur

card.name: Mana Leak
card.property: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The fatal flaw in every plan is the assumption that you know more than your enemy.

card.name: Mulldrifter
card.property: Flying When Mulldrifter enters the battlefield, draw two cards. Evoke {2}{U} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

card.name: Narcolepsy
card.property: Enchant creature At the beginning of each upkeep, if enchanted creature is untapped, tap it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's so cute when it's sleeping, isn't it? Actually, it's still as abhorrent as ever, but at least it's not trying to kill us." —Noyan Dar, Tazeem lullmage

card.name: Novijen Sages
card.property: Graft 4 (This creature enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this creature onto it.) {1}, Remove two +1/+1 counters from among creatures you control: Draw a card.

card.name: Qumulox
card.property: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.) Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even the clouds bend themselves to Memnarch's will, eager to swallow those who oppose him.

card.name: Remand
card.property: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it into its owner's hand instead of into that player's graveyard. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For the Azorius, the law can be a physical shield against chaos and anarchy.

card.name: Repeal
card.property: Return target nonland permanent with converted mana cost X to its owner's hand. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your deed cannot be undone. You, however, can be." —Agosto, Azorius imperator

card.name: Somber Hoverguard
card.property: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.) Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The vedalken interrogate all intruders—once the hoverguards are done with them.

card.name: Steady Progress
card.property: Proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.) Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "More of that strange oil . . . It's probably nothing."

card.name: Stoic Rebuttal
card.property: Metalcraft — This spell costs {1} less to cast if you control three or more artifacts. Counter target spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Obsessed with the pursuit of knowledge above all else, vedalken can appear to be cold and emotionless.

card.name: Surrakar Spellblade
card.property: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may put a charge counter on Surrakar Spellblade. Whenever Surrakar Spellblade deals combat damage to a player, you may draw X cards, where X is the number of charge counters on it.

card.name: Telling Time
card.property: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand, one on top of your library, and one on the bottom of your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mastery is achieved when "telling time" becomes "telling time what to do."

card.name: Tezzeret the Seeker
card.property: +1: Untap up to two target artifacts. −X: Search your library for an artifact card with converted mana cost X or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library. −5: Artifacts you control become artifact creatures with base power and toughness 5/5 until end of turn.

card.name: Tezzeret's Gambit
card.property: ({U/P} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.) Draw two cards, then proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)

card.name: Thoughtcast
card.property: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.) Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Vedalken eyes don't see the beauty in things. They see only what those things can teach.

card.name: Thrummingbird
card.property: Flying Whenever Thrummingbird deals combat damage to a player, proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)

card.name: Vapor Snag
card.property: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Its controller loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This creature is inadequate. Send it to the splicers for innovation." —Malcator, Executor of Synthesis

card.name: Vendilion Clique
card.property: Flash Flying When Vendilion Clique enters the battlefield, look at target player's hand. You may choose a nonland card from it. If you do, that player reveals the chosen card, puts it on the bottom of their library, then draws a card.

card.name: Vigean Graftmage
card.property: Graft 2 (This creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this creature onto it.) {1}{U}: Untap target creature with a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Water Servant
card.property: {U}: Water Servant gets +1/-1 until end of turn. {U}: Water Servant gets -1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This creature has innate perceptiveness. It knows when to rise and when to vanish into the tides." —Jestus Dreya, Of Elements and Eternity

card.name: Wings of Velis Vel
card.property: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) Until end of turn, target creature has base power and toughness 4/4, gains all creature types, and gains flying.

card.name: Bitterblossom
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life and create a 1/1 black Faerie Rogue creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In Lorwyn's brief evenings, the sun pauses at the horizon long enough for a certain species of violet to bloom with the fragrance of mischief.

card.name: Bloodthrone Vampire
card.property: Sacrifice a creature: Bloodthrone Vampire gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some humans willingly offered up their blood, hoping it would grant the vampire families the strength to stave off the Eldrazi.

card.name: Bone Splinters
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Destroy target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Witches of the Split-Eye Coven speak of a future when Grixis will overflow with life energy. For now, they must harvest vis from the living to fuel their dark magics.

card.name: Daggerclaw Imp
card.property: Flying Daggerclaw Imp can't block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Simic use the claws as scalpels, while the Rakdos use them for tattooing and torture. The Gruul use them to pick their teeth after lunching on the rest of the carcass.

card.name: Dark Confidant
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You lose life equal to its converted mana cost.

card.name: Death Denied
card.property: Return X target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Takenuma was filled with a chorus of moans, shrieks, and wails. Some came from the living, some from the dying, and some, most horribly, from the dead.

card.name: Deathmark
card.property: Destroy target green or white creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There are few ways to escape the deathmark: bargaining with a demon, washing in the fabled waters of youth, and of course, death.

card.name: Devouring Greed
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may sacrifice any number of Spirits. Target player loses 2 life plus 2 life for each Spirit sacrificed this way. You gain that much life.

card.name: Dismember
card.property: ({B/P} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.) Target creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You serve Phyrexia. Your pieces would better serve Phyrexia elsewhere." —Azax-Azog, the Demon Thane

card.name: Dread Drone
card.property: When Dread Drone enters the battlefield, create two 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each Eldrazi ancient spawned a lineage of horrors in unfathomable shapes.

card.name: Duskhunter Bat
card.property: Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.) Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The swamps go silent at its approach, but it still hears the heartbeat of the prey within.

card.name: Endrek Sahr, Master Breeder
card.property: Whenever you cast a creature spell, create X 1/1 black Thrull creature tokens, where X is that spell's converted mana cost. When you control seven or more Thrulls, sacrifice Endrek Sahr, Master Breeder.

card.name: Ghostly Changeling
card.property: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) {1}{B}: Ghostly Changeling gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In desolate places, changelings may take the shape of fancies, or memories, or fears.

card.name: Grim Affliction
card.property: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature, then proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even the small wounds let hope bleed out.

card.name: Instill Infection
card.property: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The results of our ninth inoculation were the same. The specimen was, of course, euthanized before the contagion could spread." —Vedalken research notes

card.name: Midnight Banshee
card.property: Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.) At the beginning of your upkeep, put a -1/-1 counter on each nonblack creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many have heard the beginning of its low, sustained shriek but few the end.

card.name: Nameless Inversion
card.property: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) Target creature gets +3/-3 and loses all creature types until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Just as a changeling's influence can have dramatic effects, so too can its sudden withdrawal.

card.name: Necroskitter
card.property: Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.) Whenever a creature an opponent controls with a -1/-1 counter on it dies, you may return that card to the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Plagued Rusalka
card.property: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Look at her, once filled with innocence. Death has a way of wringing away such . . . deficiencies."—Savra

card.name: Profane Command
card.property: Choose two — • Target player loses X life. • Return target creature card with converted mana cost X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. • Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn. • Up to X target creatures gain fear until end of turn. (They can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

card.name: Puppeteer Clique
card.property: Flying When Puppeteer Clique enters the battlefield, put target creature card from an opponent's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. It gains haste. At the beginning of your next end step, exile it. Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

card.name: Reassembling Skeleton
card.property: {1} {B}: Return Reassembling Skeleton from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though you may see the same bones, you'll never see the same skeleton twice.

card.name: Scavenger Drake
card.property: Flying Whenever another creature dies, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Scavenger Drake.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dragons consider drakes to be mockeries of their perfection, destroying them on sight.

card.name: Scuttling Death
card.property: Sacrifice Scuttling Death: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Soulshift 4 (When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with converted mana cost 4 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

card.name: Shrivel
card.property: All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Have you ever killed insects nibbling at your crops? I think that's what the Eldrazi believe they're doing to us." —Sheyda, Ondu gamekeeper

card.name: Sickle Ripper
card.property: Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His sickle was forged in the heat of another cinder's funeral pyre.

card.name: Sign in Blood
card.property: Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Little agonies pave the way to greater power.

card.name: Spread the Sickness
card.property: Destroy target creature, then proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Life is ephemeral. Phyrexia is eternal.

card.name: Surgical Extraction
card.property: {B/P}

({B/P} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.) Choose target card in a graveyard other than a basic land card. Search its owner's graveyard, hand, and library for any number of cards with the same name as that card and exile them. Then that player shuffles their library.

card.name: Thief of Hope
card.property: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. Soulshift 2 (When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with converted mana cost 2 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

card.name: Vampire Lacerator
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life unless an opponent has 10 or less life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The lacerators cut themselves before each hunt. They must feed before the sun rises or bleed to death.

card.name: Vampire Outcasts
card.property: Bloodthirst 2 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.) Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some vampires reject the decadent trappings of their kind. Once they turn feral, no amount of blood will satisfy their hunger.

card.name: Waking Nightmare
card.property: Target player discards two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Once each year, the oni and other evil spirits paraded through villages to disturb mortals' sleep. During the war, this parade became a nightly event." —Observations of the Kami War

card.name: Banefire
card.property: Banefire deals X damage to any target. If X is 5 or more, this spell can't be countered and the damage can't be prevented.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For Sarkhan Vol, the dragon is the purest expression of life's savage splendor.

card.name: Blades of Velis Vel
card.property: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) Up to two target creatures each get +2/+0 and gain all creature types until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The changing kind suffers as we do. We must join as one to quench our tyrants!"

card.name: Blood Ogre
card.property: Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.) First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ogres taunt the dragons by moving into their territory, but even the hellkites find them too much trouble to hunt." —Marza, mountain scout

card.name: Bloodshot Trainee
card.property: {T}: Bloodshot Trainee deals 4 damage to target creature. Activate this ability only if Bloodshot Trainee's power is 4 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Just think how strong I'll be if my arms don't tear off!"

card.name: Brute Force
card.property: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Blood, bone, and sinew are magnified, as is the rage that drives them. The brain, however, remains unchanged—a little bean, swinging by a strand in a cavernous, raving head.

card.name: Burst Lightning
card.property: Kicker {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell.) Burst Lightning deals 2 damage to any target. If this spell was kicked, it deals 4 damage to that permanent or player instead.

card.name: Combust
card.property: This spell can't be countered. Combust deals 5 damage to target white or blue creature. The damage can't be prevented.

card.name: Comet Storm
card.property: Multikicker {1} (You may pay an additional {1} any number of times as you cast this spell.) Choose any target, then choose another target for each time this spell was kicked. Comet Storm deals X damage to each of them.

card.name: Dragonsoul Knight
card.property: First strike {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Until end of turn, Dragonsoul Knight becomes a Dragon, gets +5/+3, and gains flying and trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The farther he roamed from Jund and its dragons, the more he felt their essence in himself.

card.name: Fiery Fall
card.property: Fiery Fall deals 5 damage to target creature. Basic landcycling {1}{R} ({1}{R}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.)

card.name: Goblin Fireslinger
card.property: {T}: Goblin Fireslinger deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A rock between your eyes hurts. A burning rock between your eyes ruins your whole day.

card.name: Goblin War Paint
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has haste.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: War paint made from kolya fruit heightens senses and lessens fear. Unfortunately, fear is usually what keeps you alive.

card.name: Gorehorn Minotaurs
card.property: Bloodthirst 2 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some of the eleven minotaur clans of Mirtiin are expert crafters and learned philosophers. Others just like to hit stuff.

card.name: Gut Shot
card.property: {R/P}
({R/P} can be paid with either {R} or 2 life.) Gut Shot deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Down here, we have a more pointed version of the scriptures." —Urabrask's enforcer

card.name: Hellkite Charger
card.property: Flying, haste Whenever Hellkite Charger attacks, you may pay {5}{R}{R}. If you do, untap all attacking creatures and after this phase, there is an additional combat phase.

card.name: Incandescent Soulstoke
card.property: Other Elemental creatures you control get +1/+1. {1}{R}, {T}: You may put an Elemental creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. That creature gains haste until end of turn. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Inner-Flame Igniter
card.property: {2} {R}: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn. If this is the third time this ability has resolved this turn, creatures you control gain first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A light an army can follow.

card.name: Kiki-Jiki, Mirror Breaker
card.property: Haste {T}: Create a token that's a copy of target nonlegendary creature you control, except it has haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Lightning Bolt
card.property: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The sparkmage shrieked, calling on the rage of the storms of his youth. To his surprise, the sky responded with a fierce energy he'd never thought to see again.

card.name: Skarrgan Firebird
card.property: Bloodthirst 3 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.) Flying {R}{R}{R}: Return Skarrgan Firebird from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only if an opponent was dealt damage this turn.

card.name: Smash to Smithereens
card.property: Destroy target artifact. Smash to Smithereens deals 3 damage to that artifact's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The giant Tarvik dreamed that trinkets and machines caused all the world's woe. When he awoke from his troubled sleep, he took the name Tarvik Relicsmasher.

card.name: Smokebraider
card.property: {T}: Add two mana in any combination of colors. Spend this mana only to cast Elemental spells or activate abilities of Elementals.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Be silent and listen to your inner fire. Only then can you walk the Path of Flame."

card.name: Soulbright Flamekin
card.property: {2}: Target creature gains trample until end of turn. If this is the third time this ability has resolved this turn, you may add {R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When provoked, a flamekin's inner fire burns far hotter than any giant's forge.

card.name: Spikeshot Elder

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Now that he knows a thousand ways of hurting people, his next shamanic quest is to discover a thousand more.

card.name: Spitebellows
card.property: When Spitebellows leaves the battlefield, it deals 6 damage to target creature. Evoke {1}{R}{R} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Disaster stalks with gaping jaws across unready lands.

card.name: Splinter Twin
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{T}: Create a token that's a copy of this creature, except it has haste. Exile that token at the beginning of the next end step."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I know just the person for that job."

card.name: Stormblood Berserker
card.property: Bloodthirst 2 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.) Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Blood is holy to those whose god is War.

card.name: Thunderblust
card.property: Haste Thunderblust has trample as long as it has a -1/-1 counter on it. Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

card.name: Tribal Flames
card.property: Domain — Tribal Flames deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fire is the universal language." —Jhoira, master artificer

card.name: Viashino Slaughtermaster
card.property: Double strike {B}{G}: Viashino Slaughtermaster gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'll fight two at once, and then lick their guts from my blades."

card.name: Wildfire
card.property: Each player sacrifices four lands. Wildfire deals 4 damage to each creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fire is always at the top of the food chain, and it has a big appetite.

card.name: Worldheart Phoenix
card.property: Flying You may cast Worldheart Phoenix from your graveyard by paying {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} rather than paying its mana cost. If you do, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Wrap in Flames
card.property: Wrap in Flames deals 1 damage to each of up to three target creatures. Those creatures can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our pyromancer's flames may not have killed them, but they bought us the time we needed." —The War Diaries

card.name: Algae Gharial
card.property: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Whenever another creature dies, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Algae Gharial.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It lurks just under the surface, using the algae-choked tar pits of Jund as both home and hunting blind.

card.name: All Suns' Dawn
card.property: For each color, return up to one target card of that color from your graveyard to your hand. Exile All Suns' Dawn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When the fifth sun rose, Mirrodin saw its first true dawn." —Inscribed on the skin of Thrun, the last troll

card.name: Ant Queen
card.property: {1} {G}: Create a 1/1 green Insect creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Kill the queen first, or we'll be fighting her drones forever. It is not in a queen's nature to have enough servants." —Borzard, exterminator captain

card.name: Aquastrand Spider
card.property: Graft 2 (This creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this creature onto it.) {G}: Target creature with a +1/+1 counter on it gains reach until end of turn. (It can block creatures with flying.)

card.name: Bestial Menace
card.property: Create a 1/1 green Snake creature token, a 2/2 green Wolf creature token, and a 3/3 green Elephant creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My battle cry reaches ears far keener than yours." —Saidah, Joraga hunter

card.name: Commune with Nature
card.property: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Cytoplast Root-Kin
card.property: Graft 4 (This creature enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this creature onto it.) When Cytoplast Root-Kin enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it. {2}: Move a +1/+1 counter from target creature you control onto Cytoplast Root-Kin.

card.name: Gnarlid Pack
card.property: Multikicker {1}{G} (You may pay an additional {1}{G} any number of times as you cast this spell.) Gnarlid Pack enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each time it was kicked.

card.name: Karplusan Strider
card.property: Karplusan Strider can't be the target of blue or black spells.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The strider's long, loping gait is an adaptation that allows it to move quickly in deep snow.

card.name: Kavu Primarch
card.property: Kicker {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell.) Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) If Kavu Primarch was kicked, it enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Kozilek's Predator
card.property: When Kozilek's Predator enters the battlefield, create two 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's difficult to outwit something that doesn't speak, strategize, or even think.

card.name: Matca Rioters
card.property: Domain — Matca Rioters's power and toughness are each equal to the number of basic land types among lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When outsiders interrupted the matca championship, things got ugly.

card.name: Mutagenic Growth
card.property: {G/P}
({G/P} can be paid with either {G} or 2 life.) Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sympathy is for weaklings. Whoever survives, wins." —Benzir, archdruid of Temple Might

card.name: Nest Invader
card.property: When Nest Invader enters the battlefield, create a 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature token. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It nurtures its masters' glorious future.

card.name: Noble Hierarch
card.property: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) {T}: Add {G}, {W}, or {U}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She protects the sacred groves from blight, drought, and the Unbeholden.

card.name: Overwhelm
card.property: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Creatures you control get +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let the song of Selesnya be heard above the rhythm of our thundering hordes!"

card.name: Overwhelming Stampede
card.property: Until end of turn, creatures you control gain trample and get +X/+X, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I trust the instincts of any beast over the advice of any human who presumes to be an expert in the art of war." —Rinshel, elf insurgent

card.name: Pelakka Wurm
card.property: Trample When Pelakka Wurm enters the battlefield, you gain 7 life. When Pelakka Wurm dies, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It eats what it wants to eat—which is anything that moves.

card.name: Plummet
card.property: Destroy target creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let nothing own the skies but the wind." —Dejara, Giltwood druid

card.name: Primeval Titan
card.property: Trample Whenever Primeval Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, you may search your library for up to two land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Rampant Growth
card.property: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nature grows solutions to her problems.

card.name: Root-Kin Ally
card.property: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Tap two untapped creatures you control: Root-Kin Ally gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Scatter the Seeds
card.property: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Create three 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From the seeds of faith, great forests grow.

card.name: Scion of the Wild
card.property: Scion of the Wild's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It has a hundred thousand extinctions to avenge.

card.name: Scute Mob
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control five or more lands, put four +1/+1 counters on Scute Mob.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Survival rule 781: There are always more scute bugs." —Zurdi, goblin shortcutter

card.name: Simic Initiate
card.property: Graft 1 (This creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this creature onto it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Simic initiates begin their training as experimental subjects. Failures are flushed to the undersewers.

card.name: Sundering Vitae
card.property: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Centuries of wind, rain, and roots compressed into an instant of destruction: such is the power of Selesnya.

card.name: Sylvan Bounty
card.property: Target player gains 8 life. Basic landcycling {1}{G} ({1}{G}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some who scouted new lands chose to stay.

card.name: Tarmogoyf
card.property: Tarmogoyf's power is equal to the number of card types among cards in all graveyards and its toughness is equal to that number plus 1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: What doesn't grow, dies. And what dies grows the tarmogoyf.

card.name: Thrive
card.property: Put a +1/+1 counter on each of X target creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The most successful of Simic creations is cytoplasm, a living, symbiotic substance that feeds off genetic rhythms and strengthens its host in return.

card.name: Tukatongue Thallid
card.property: When Tukatongue Thallid dies, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Jund's thallids tried to disguise their deliciousness by covering themselves in spines harvested from the tukatongue tree.

card.name: Vines of Vastwood
card.property: Kicker {G} (You may pay an additional {G} as you cast this spell.) Target creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control this turn. If this spell was kicked, that creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

card.name: Wolfbriar Elemental
card.property: Multikicker {G} (You may pay an additional {G} any number of times as you cast this spell.) When Wolfbriar Elemental enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token for each time it was kicked.

card.name: Agony Warp
card.property: Target creature gets -3/-0 until end of turn. Target creature gets -0/-3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Life's circle has become inverted in Grixis. The same energy is endlessly recycled and becomes more stagnant with each pass.

card.name: Apocalypse Hydra
card.property: Apocalypse Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. If X is 5 or more, it enters the battlefield with an additional X +1/+1 counters on it. {1}{R}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Apocalypse Hydra: Apocalypse Hydra deals 1 damage to any target.

card.name: Boros Swiftblade
card.property: Double strike

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the Boros Legion attacks, swiftblades enter the fray first. They pick off the archers and mages, softening the enemy front before the flame-kin and giants go in.

card.name: Drooling Groodion

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Golgari expand, yes, but I refuse to call their tainted creations 'growth.'" —Veszka, Selesnya evangel

card.name: Electrolyze
card.property: Electrolyze deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Izzet learn something from every lesson they teach.

card.name: Ethercaste Knight
card.property: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We coat ourselves in steel every day. What is etherium but the next logical step?"

card.name: Ghost Council of Orzhova
card.property: When Ghost Council of Orzhova enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Exile Ghost Council of Orzhova. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Glassdust Hulk
card.property: Whenever another artifact enters the battlefield under your control, Glassdust Hulk gets +1/+1 until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn. Cycling {W/U} ({W/U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Horde of Notions

property.name: Color
property.value: Multicolor White Blue Black Red Green

card.property: Vigilance, trample, haste {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: You may play target Elemental card from your graveyard without paying its mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even the oldest treefolk was but an acorn when Lorwyn's first mysteries were born.

card.name: Lorescale Coatl
card.property: Whenever you draw a card, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Lorescale Coatl.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The enlightenment I never found in etherium I have found traced in the coatl's scales." —Ranalus, vedalken heretic

card.name: Mystic Snake
card.property: Flash When Mystic Snake enters the battlefield, counter target spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its fangs are in your flesh before its hiss leaves your ears.

card.name: Necrogenesis
card.property: {2}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Those may be the squirms of one life ending or of another beginning. Either way, I'd leave it alone." —Rakka Mar

card.name: Niv-Mizzet, the Firemind
card.property: Flying Whenever you draw a card, Niv-Mizzet, the Firemind deals 1 damage to any target. {T}: Draw a card.

card.name: Pillory of the Sleepless
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block. Enchanted creature has "At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Which is worse—the sleep which never ends or that which never comes?

card.name: Plaxcaster Frogling
card.property: Graft 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this creature onto it.) {2}: Target creature with a +1/+1 counter on it gains shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

card.name: Savage Twister
card.property: Savage Twister deals X damage to each creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nature is the ultimate mindless destroyer, capable of power and ferocity no army can match, and the Gruul follow its example." —Trigori, Azorius senator

card.name: Shadowmage Infiltrator
card.property: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) Whenever Shadowmage Infiltrator deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.

card.name: Sigil Blessing
card.property: Until end of turn, target creature you control gets +3/+3 and other creatures you control get +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "For unwavering commitment and unflinching strength, the Order of the White Orchid confers its sigil. Rise, knight-captain, and do your duty."

card.name: Vengeful Rebirth
card.property: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand. If you return a nonland card to your hand this way, Vengeful Rebirth deals damage equal to that card's converted mana cost to any target. Exile Vengeful Rebirth.

card.name: Wrecking Ball
card.property: Destroy target creature or land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rakdos festivals almost leave enough rubble in their wake to hide the bodies.

card.name: Ashenmoor Gouger
card.property: Ashenmoor Gouger can't block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After his hands had crumbled away, leaving only wickedly sharp points, he decided his only purpose was war.

card.name: Creakwood Liege
card.property: Other black creatures you control get +1/+1. Other green creatures you control get +1/+1. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may create a 1/1 black and green Worm creature token.

card.name: Dimir Guildmage
card.property: ({U/B} can be paid with either {U} or {B}.) {3}{U}: Target player draws a card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery. {3}{B}: Target player discards a card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Fulminator Mage
card.property: Sacrifice Fulminator Mage: Destroy target nonbasic land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Unsafe Terrain Ahead—Turn Back" —Sign near the former location of Pyrtagh Cairn

card.name: Hearthfire Hobgoblin
card.property: Double strike

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hobgoblins are best left alone. They sharpen their farm implements far more than is necessary for their work in the fields.

card.name: Nobilis of War
card.property: Flying Attacking creatures you control get +2/+0.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A great siege is a banquet to him; a long and terrible battle, the most exquisite delicacy." —The Seer's Parables

card.name: Restless Apparition
Selesnya Guildmage
Shrewd Hatchling
card.property: Shrewd Hatchling enters the battlefield with four -1/-1 counters on it. {U/R}: Target creature can't block Shrewd Hatchling this turn. Whenever you cast a blue spell, remove a -1/-1 counter from Shrewd Hatchling. Whenever you cast a red spell, remove a -1/-1 counter from Shrewd Hatchling.

card.name: Swans of Bryn Argoll
card.property: Flying If a source would deal damage to Swans of Bryn Argoll, prevent that damage. The source's controller draws cards equal to the damage prevented this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Any being that harms them quickly learns its lesson.

card.name: Wilt-Leaf Liege
card.property: Other green creatures you control get +1/+1. Other white creatures you control get +1/+1. If a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Wilt-Leaf Liege, put it onto the battlefield instead of putting it into your graveyard.

card.name: Alloy Myr
card.property: {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With or without witnesses, the suns continued their prismatic dance.

card.name: Blinding Souleater
card.property: {W/P}, {T}: Tap target creature. ({W/P} can be paid with either {W} or 2 life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We thank the souleaters for inscribing our souls with subservience, to reinforce the sacred order." —Drones' hymn of gratitude

card.name: Cathodion
card.property: When Cathodion dies, add {C}{C}{C}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Instead of creating a tool that would be damaged by heat, the Thran built one that was charged by it.

card.name: Chimeric Mass
card.property: Chimeric Mass enters the battlefield with X charge counters on it. {1}: Until end of turn, Chimeric Mass becomes a Construct artifact creature with "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of charge counters on it."

card.name: Copper Carapace
card.property: Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and can't block. Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We will fight as they do: our flesh protected behind metal." —Tae Aquil, Viridian weaponsmith

card.name: Cranial Plating
Culling Dais
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Put a charge counter on Culling Dais. {1}, Sacrifice Culling Dais: Draw a card for each charge counter on Culling Dais.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Forswear the flesh and you will truly see." —Jin-Gitaxias, Core Augur

card.name: Darksteel Axe

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Heavier than it looks, tricky to wield, guaranteed to last.

card.name: Etched Champion
card.property: Metalcraft — Etched Champion has protection from all colors as long as you control three or more artifacts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its predecessors were etched with the wisdom of ancients; its own etchings bear warnings of a future fraught with war.

card.name: Etched Monstrosity
card.property: Etched Monstrosity enters the battlefield with five -1/-1 counters on it. {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}, Remove five -1/-1 counters from Etched Monstrosity: Target player draws three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Now etched only with the scars of phyresis.

card.name: Etched Oracle
card.property: Sunburst (This enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.) {1}, Remove four +1/+1 counters from Etched Oracle: Target player draws three cards.

card.name: Everflowing Chalice
card.property: Multikicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} any number of times as you cast this spell.) Everflowing Chalice enters the battlefield with a charge counter on it for each time it was kicked. {T}: Add {C} for each charge counter on Everflowing Chalice.

card.name: Expedition Map
card.property: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Expedition Map: Search your library for a land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I use maps to find out where explorers have already been. Then I go the other way." —Javad Nasrin, Ondu relic hunter

card.name: Flayer Husk
Frogmite
card.property: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: At first, vedalken observers thought blinkmoths naturally avoided certain places. Then they realized those places were frogmite feeding grounds.

card.name: Glint Hawk Idol
card.property: Whenever another artifact enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Glint Hawk Idol become a 2/2 Bird artifact creature with flying until end of turn. {W}: Glint Hawk Idol becomes a 2/2 Bird artifact creature with flying until end of turn.

card.name: Gust-Skimmer
card.property: {U}: Gust-Skimmer gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Phyrexian smog clouds choked the skies, threatening creatures who couldn't comprehend the menace below.

card.name: Kitesail
card.property: Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has flying. Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Kitesailing is a way of life—and without practice, the end of it.

card.name: Lodestone Golem
card.property: Nonartifact spells cost {1} more to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Somehow it warps the Æther. It brings a strange weight, a blockade in the flow of spellcraft." —Noyan Dar, Tazeem lullmage

card.name: Lodestone Myr
card.property: Trample Tap an untapped artifact you control: Lodestone Myr gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When necessary, myr can override and control any artificial object, as can their creator.

card.name: Long-Forgotten Gohei
card.property: Arcane spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Spirit creatures you control get +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Long ago, the priests would wave the gohei to call down the gods. Now it lies forgotten, but the spirits still feel its pull.

card.name: Mortarpod
Mox Opal
card.property: Metalcraft — {T}: Add one mana of any color. Activate this ability only if you control three or more artifacts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The suns of Mirrodin have shone upon perfection only once.

card.name: Myr Enforcer
card.property: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Most myr monitor other species. Some myr monitor other myr.

card.name: Precursor Golem
card.property: When Precursor Golem enters the battlefield, create two 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature tokens. Whenever a player casts an instant or sorcery spell that targets only a single Golem, that player copies that spell for each other Golem that spell could target. Each copy targets a different one of those Golems.

card.name: Runed Servitor
card.property: When Runed Servitor dies, each player draws a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Scholars had puzzled for centuries over the ruins at Tal Terig. Its secrets had always lived within one rune-carved head.

card.name: Rusted Relic
card.property: Metalcraft — Rusted Relic is a 5/5 Golem artifact creature as long as you control three or more artifacts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We consider rust a curable disease." —Tarrin, Hammer-Tribe shaman

card.name: Sickleslicer
Skyreach Manta
card.property: Sunburst (This enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.) Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the dawns break, the manta soars.

card.name: Spellskite
card.property: {U/P}: Change a target of target spell or ability to Spellskite. ({U/P} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let's show Vorinclex that progress doesn't always need teeth or claws." —Malcator, Executor of Synthesis

card.name: Sphere of the Suns
card.property: Sphere of the Suns enters the battlefield tapped and with three charge counters on it. {T}, Remove a charge counter from Sphere of the Suns: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Sunforger
Tumble Magnet
card.property: Tumble Magnet enters the battlefield with three charge counters on it. {T}, Remove a charge counter from Tumble Magnet: Tap target artifact or creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Magnetic devices that keep massive golems and structures standing can also be used for the opposite purpose.

card.name: Wayfarer's Bauble
card.property: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Wayfarer's Bauble: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is the forest beyond the horizon, the mountain waiting to be climbed, the new land across the endless sea.

card.name: Azorius Chancery
card.property: Azorius Chancery enters the battlefield tapped. When Azorius Chancery enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {W}{U}.

card.name: Blinkmoth Nexus
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {1}: Blinkmoth Nexus becomes a 1/1 Blinkmoth artifact creature with flying until end of turn. It's still a land. {1}, {T}: Target Blinkmoth creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Boros Garrison
card.property: Boros Garrison enters the battlefield tapped. When Boros Garrison enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {R}{W}.

card.name: Darksteel Citadel
card.property: Indestructible {T}: Add {C}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Structures built from darksteel yield to neither assault nor age.

card.name: Dimir Aqueduct
card.property: Dimir Aqueduct enters the battlefield tapped. When Dimir Aqueduct enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {U}{B}.

card.name: Eldrazi Temple
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {C}{C}. Spend this mana only to cast colorless Eldrazi spells or activate abilities of colorless Eldrazi.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each temple is a door to a horrible future.

card.name: Evolving Wilds
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every world is an organism, able to grow new lands. Some just do it faster than others.

card.name: Eye of Ugin
card.property: Colorless Eldrazi spells you cast cost {2} less to cast. {7}, {T}: Search your library for a colorless creature card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An eye closes. A race awakens.

card.name: Golgari Rot Farm
card.property: Golgari Rot Farm enters the battlefield tapped. When Golgari Rot Farm enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {B}{G}.

card.name: Gruul Turf
card.property: Gruul Turf enters the battlefield tapped. When Gruul Turf enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {R}{G}.

card.name: Izzet Boilerworks
card.property: Izzet Boilerworks enters the battlefield tapped. When Izzet Boilerworks enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {U}{R}.

card.name: Orzhov Basilica
card.property: Orzhov Basilica enters the battlefield tapped. When Orzhov Basilica enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {W}{B}.

card.name: Rakdos Carnarium
card.property: Rakdos Carnarium enters the battlefield tapped. When Rakdos Carnarium enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {B}{R}.

card.name: Selesnya Sanctuary
card.property: Selesnya Sanctuary enters the battlefield tapped. When Selesnya Sanctuary enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {G}{W}.

card.property: Simic Growth Chamber enters the battlefield tapped. When Simic Growth Chamber enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {G}{U}.
